Cuerpo: Date: Wednesday, 20-Nov-96 19:22:29 GMT Server: Quid Pro Quo/1.0b5 MIME-version: 1.0 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 3467 The Rensselaer Design Conference Room Welcome to Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute's Choose a Link from this Menu: DCR Calendar Design Rationale Research Papers CSCW Resources RPI's Design Minor Acknowledgements The Design Conference Room is a media-enhanced conference facility and The DCR is an ordinary conference room with comfortable chairs around a The foremost difference is the use of computers as a supporting extension of the physical medium used by conferees. Six Macintosh workstations are buried in side wings of the table, while the center panels. These central monitors, which show the same image to all users, taking control session participants. Users also have access to all campus-wide computing resources via X-sessions or remote login as well as the full resources of the Internet and World Wide Web via Netscape and other applications.
